resources.string: You win! Now you can take new paths and try other options. Do you dare to start over?
Defeated! Your adventure ends here. Everything will reset, but this way you can try again.
You find yourself face to face with a goblin blocking your path; although it doesn\'t seem very dangerous, you shouldn\'t let your guard down. What do you decide to do?
You come across a dark figure whose axe seems thirsty for blood; their ominous presence gives you chills. How do you choose to act?
You stand face to face with a mighty dragon whose very breath shakes the ground beneath you. Its piercing gaze challenges your courage. What do you do?
A towering and mysterious enemy appears before you, clearly ready for your arrival. Their presence is a real threat to your safety. What do you plan to do?
A dark and supernatural being risen from a forbidden realm stands between you and your final destiny. This is the ultimate challenge. How do you intend to act?
Crushing victory! The clumsy goblin has fallen. Claim your well-deserved reward now:
The hooded figure has been defeated. Their axe lies inert. Collect your rewards and move on!
The majestic dragon has been vanquished! Its scales now lie upon the ground. Choose a reward for your bravery:
You have defeated a powerful adversary! Congratulations! This was the final challenge, and your victory opens the way forward. Choose your reward:
